QuestData.Title: Dastardly Denizens of the Deep
QuestData.Description: You know, it's amazing what you can find in that old lighthouse. After I lit the lamp, I noticed this book in one of the old trunks up there.$B$B<Babs holds up the book and reads the title dramatically.>$B$B"Dastardly Denizens of the Deep!"$B$BWhy, I think I might swoon if I ever saw one of these! I'm sure it's good for a laugh or two, but I simply don't have time for reading right now.$B$BYou know who might enjoy it, though... that fishmonger on the docks, "Dirty" Michael Crowe. He collects old books.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Dastardly Denizens of the Deep to "Dirty" Michael Crowe on the Theramore docks.
QuestData.CompletionText: What'll it be today? The snook is quite good.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, now, that was thoughtful o' Babs to send that over. I don't know if you've leafed through it or not, but there's a lot of truth to the tales in that book. Sailors didn't just make it all up, you know.
